document_data.name: the Broken Body
document_data.location: The [[Palace of Sweet Pain]], the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Broken Body''' was a labyrinth used by the faithful, and exceptionally brave, of [[Loviatar]] to seek the Maiden of Pain's guidance during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The maze was secluded in the subterranean levels beneath the [[Palace of Sweet Pain]] within the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] of [[Zhentil Keep]].
document_data.Description: Hidden traps, pitfalls, and other nefarious items filled the Broken Body, all designed to maim and inflict pain, but not to kill immediately.
document_data.Activities: A supplicant who reached the maze's objective could ask questions of Loviatar as if she had cast the ''[[commune]]'' [[spell]].
